Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as a form of authoritarian censorship.
Free speech is essential in a democracy.
The government has previously made mistakes, such as with COVID-19 and The Voice, implying they should not be trusted with regulating speech.
Notable Quotes: We live in a democracy n without FREE SPEECH this world would still be classed flat.
The government got covid wrong The Voice wrong So absolutely no to any kind of authoritarian censorship.
